documentNotice: This document is currently available in Japanese only. English translation will be provided in the future.

compliance.title: Policy on Anti-Social Forces
compliance.intro: Queue Inc. (hereinafter referred to as "the Company"), as the operator of the app and web service trading platform "APPEXIT", hereby declares that it will not have any relationship with anti-social forces that threaten the order and safety of civil society, and will respond firmly to unreasonable demands from anti-social forces.

basicPolicy.title: Basic Policy
basicPolicy.description: The Company complies with the following basic policies regarding anti-social forces:
items: Sever all relationships with anti-social forces as an organization
Reject unreasonable demands from anti-social forces
Maintain no relationship whatsoever, including transactions
Take civil and criminal legal action in emergencies
Never engage in backdoor deals or provide funding
